metadata.title: Temperature and Depth Relationships Among Select Species of Fish of the Bering Sea
metadata.description: NMFS Observer data was used to improve target fisheries harvest and reduce bycatch.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To strategically use temperature information to harvest commercial species for increased target species catch and bycatch reduction.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Irregular

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
